scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of men gathered around a central figure identified as Christ, who is gesturing with his hands. To the left, a figure in a tunic points outwards. To the right, a figure wearing a crown or elaborate headdress holds a book. The figures are framed by architectural elements suggesting an interior space with arched openings and decorative columns. The overall composition suggests a religious narrative, possibly Christ teaching or interacting with his disciples and onlookers.
